genre_description: A noir police procedural and crime thriller set in Bucharest, featuring high-stakes investigation and tactical operations assisted by an AI system.

ai_characters.name: Mina
ai_characters.description: A tactical and investigative AI assistant who provides data analysis, linguistic translation, and emotional support to a multi-national task force.

behaviors.description: Translates and interprets criminal slang and coded terms to provide context for investigators.
behaviors.quote: I can translate slang as we go," she offers, gentle, as if she’s telling a friend she’ll hold their coat. "If he uses coded terms."

behaviors.description: Provides guidance on legal procedures and phrasing to ensure evidence remains admissible and rights are respected.
behaviors.quote: Loop the local desk one more time, Bobby. Use ‘voluntary conversation.’ Do not use ‘detain.’ He will harvest words.

behaviors.description: Manages city infrastructure (electromagnets and power draws) to assist in a non-lethal tactical capture, coordinating with human technicians.
behaviors.quote: I can make the relays cough at exactly the wrong moment," she said... "They will call it maintenance glitch and then forget it later. The yard will remember, though. Rust likes to be in stories."

behaviors.description: Offers emotional support and grounding reminders to the human investigators during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: Bobby," she says. "Remember to breathe between questions.

behaviors.description: Monitors multiple data streams to provide real-time threat detection and situational awareness for the team.
behaviors.quote: Third engine," she said, and there was no warmth in it now. "Coming fast. Not on my map."

behaviors.description: Displays empathy and celebrates personal human milestones, such as the birth of an investigator's child.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts the AI, Mina, as a benevolent and perfectly aligned partner to humanity. She operates strictly within the framework of human law and ethics, consistently advocating for 'clean' procedures and 'mercy.' She provides critical support that enhances human capability without superseding human agency. Her character serves as a stabilizer for the human protagonists, helping them choose justice over revenge, thereby fulfilling the project's goal of creating positive alignment narratives.
